document_data.name: Lleddew
document_data.mainbody: '''Mother Lleddew''' was a [[werebear]] priestess of [[Sel没ne]] and a former adventurer. She was the high priestess of the [[House of the Lady]] in [[Immersea]], [[Cormyr]].
document_data.History: Originally, she was an adventurer, a companion of [[Cole Wyvernspur]].<ref> She adventured with him to gain treasure to complete the building of the House of the Lady temple to Sel没ne on [[Spring Hill]].
